aboutMe.hello: Hello, I'm Silvio Orlando Carrandi Noa
aboutMe.description:
Hello! I'm {{name}}, a Fullstack Developer with +{{years}} years of experience and a degree in Computer Science Engineering (2014).
Specialized in frontend with <primary>React.js, TypeScript, and Next.js</primary>, I've developed efficient <primary>backoffices</primary> and scalable <primary>e-commerce</primary> solutions, applying componentization, performance optimization, and development best practices.
With a fullstack vision and a focus on quality and scalability, I create robust technical solutions that drive business impact. I'm passionate about continuous learning and sharing knowledge to foster technological growth.

service_1.title: Front-End Development
service_1.description: Modern and responsive web applications with React.js, Next.js, and TypeScript, optimized for an excellent user experience on any device.

service_2.title: Back-End Development
service_2.description: Scalable and secure APIs with NestJS, focused on data management, authentication, and business logic.

service_3.title: Full Stack Development
service_3.description: Complete solutions integrating front-end (React, Next.js) and back-end (NestJS) with high performance, best practices, and optimized SEO.

service_4.title: Static Websites with Astro
service_4.description: Fast and SEO-optimized websites with Astro, ideal for lightweight content and high performance.

service_5.title: Web3 & Smart Contracts Development
service_5.description: Creation of decentralized applications (dApps) with smart contract integration using wagmi and ethers.js, ensuring secure blockchain connectivity. Development of NFT marketplaces, enabling the purchase, sale, and exchange of digital assets.

service_6.title: API Development & Integration
service_6.description: Custom REST and GraphQL APIs to efficiently connect services and enhance application functionality.

standard.title: Standard Plan
standard.description: For web applications with APIs and databases.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Plan
enterprise.description: For Web3, blockchain, and large-scale projects.
